Description :
        A story about a lesbian office lady fed up with a society where she has to go along with the convenience of heterosexuals, even though same-s** marriage is still not legal and may not be in the near future.One day, she reconnects with an old crush who was always popular with men. Now in a troubled marriage, she asks to spend the night.This is the story of two people who are polar opposites who question the ideal state of "marriage" and "happiness".Read Usotsuki Hanayome to Dousei Kekkon-ron on mangabuddy+
